tool_description: A REST API that returns the legends information, and can return all legends that fall under the same class.
name: Apex Legends Champions
title: Apex Legends Champions

api_list.name: Get Class
api_list.description: This endpoint returns legends that fall under the same class.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apex-legends-champions.p.rapidapi.com/getClass/Recon"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apex-legends-champions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://apex-legends-champions.p.rapidapi.com/getClass/{is_class}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apex-legends-champions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Legend
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a specific legend.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apex-legends-champions.p.rapidapi.com/getLegend/Ash"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apex-legends-champions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://apex-legends-champions.p.rapidapi.com/getLegend/{alias}"

api_list.name: Get All Legends
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all legends that are currently in the game.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apex-legends-champions.p.rapidapi.com/getAllLegends"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apex-legends-champions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
